title: Novacoast Named to 2015 CRN Fast Growth 150 List
text: Email This Story Printer Friendly PDF Version RSS Feed Novacoast Named to 2015 CRN Fast Growth 150 List For the fifth time, Novacoast Inc. has been recognized by CRN as one of the fastest growing IT shops. A focus on strategic security services and hands-on-site approach to problem solving have helped Novacoast grow quickly and consistently. LOS ANGELES, CA, September 29,   Novacoast, Inc., a professional services and product development company, announced that it has been named to The Channel Company's 2015 CRN Fast Growth 150 list. Based on gross revenue over the two-year period from 2012 to 2014, The Fast Growth 150 list ranks solution providers based in North America with significant economic growth. In a turbulent IT economy, these companies have shown exceptional prowess in growing their operations and constantly providing essential services to their customers. Over the past two years, Novacoast has expanded our security offerings and penetration testing practices. As breaches have escalated, Novacoast has offered more advisory services to mitigate panic and help bring our customers into a proactive security policy. "We're proud to yet again be recognized by CRN for our continued success," said Novacoast CEO and founder Paul Anderson. "Novacoast is committed to evolving our offerings to keep our customers in-step with the developing threats and demands they face." "Cloud computing, mobile and big data technologies are making the industry both more exciting and more challenging than it's ever been," says Robert Faletra, CEO of The Channel Company. "Solution providers recognized in CRN's Fast Growth 150 list are rising to meet the challenge and are thriving as a result. We are pleased to recognize these firms as leaders in today's IT channel." The Fast Growth 150 list is highlighted in the October issue of CRN and can be viewed online at http://crn.com/fastgrowth.About Novacoast Novacoast is a blended security services, everything services and product development partner--the kind of shop that can help with everything from an understaffed IT ops team to a bad website interface. To our clients and partners, we are a trusted advisor. We help from identifying a problem, through planning and implementation, and finally to ongoing management services. We're particularly known for our security consulting and penetration testing powered by our in-house development team--which always keeps up with the latest threat trends and hackers' toolsets. More than anything, Novacoast is a resource engine. We select for fearlessness and ingenuity in our technical talent, and support them with a collaborative culture of adaptable problem solving. Learn more at http://www.novacoast.com. About The Channel Company The Channel Company, with established brands including CRN , XChange Events and IPED , is the channel community's trusted authority for growth and innovation. For more than three decades, we have leveraged our proven and leading-edge platforms to deliver prescriptive sales and marketing solutions for the technology channel. The Channel Company provides Communication, Recruitment, Engagement, Enablement, Demand Generation and Intelligence services to drive technology partnerships. Learn more at http://www.thechannelcompany.com. # # #
